snippet.title: Byzantine: The Betrayal - Video Game Trailer (1998)
snippet.description:
Byzantine: The Betrayal , official trailer.
Developed by Stormfront Studios 
Published in late 1997 by Discovery Channel Multimedia for PC (Windows)
Distributed in France by Ubi Soft, in Germany by Egmont Interactive, in Netherlands by Valkieser, in Brazil by Globo Multimedia.
Year : Late 1997 (USA), Early 1998 (Europe).

This trailer is the first part of the 'multimedia' demo of the game.
Demo found on coverdisc of the French Magazine PC  Team (Issue 33, March 1998)
